sentences.sContent: He looked across at Jackson, doodling on his notebook.
sentences.sCn: 他一边看着对面的杰克逊，一边在笔记本上信手涂鸦。

sentences.sContent: Dillworthy was staring into space, with a scrawl of doodles on the pad in front of him.
sentences.sCn: 迪尔沃西凝望着天空，面前的纸上满是涂鸦。

trans.tranOther: When someone doodles, they draw doodles
A doodle is a pattern or picture that you draw when you are bored or thinking about something else
